title: Automatic media detection
content: Taiga can detect the media player of your choice, identify the files you're watching and update your list automatically. It works for streaming services too!

title: Interactive season charts
content: Taiga's season charts are dynamic and up-to-date. You can sort them by global score or filter them by genres, among other things. And it takes only a few clicks to add an anime to your library.

title: Share with other people
content: Share the current episode you're watching by updating your Discord rich presence, sending a message to IRC channels, or making an HTTP request to any URL.

title: Download new episodes
content: Taiga is able to check RSS feeds for torrent releases. You can either manually choose which files you'd like to download, or fully automate the process by setting up smart filters.
